small.description: Basic tower, takes up 1x1 grid space

medium.description: Advanced tower, takes up 2x2 grid space

large.description: Elite tower, takes up 3x3 grid space

normal.description: Standard physical damage with no special armor-piercing properties.

piercing.description: Damage that partially ignores armor, especially effective against lightly armored foes.

chaos.description: Unpredictable, raw energy damage that deals full damage regardless of armor.

siege.description: Specialized damage effective against fortified or heavily armored targets.

arcane.description: Mystical damage that bypasses some defenses and may trigger magical effects.

crystal_castle.description: Pure Chaos damage snipers and chain beamsâ€”armor bypass, very high single target DPS when built out.

crystal_castle_facet_focuser.name: Facet Focuser
crystal_castle_facet_focuser.description: A powerful crystal that focuses energy onto a single target.

pyro.description: Heavy splash + burn over time auras and traps. Excels at crowd control.

special.description: Burns enemies.

pyro_fire_trap.name: Fire Trap
pyro_fire_trap.description: A fire trap that burns enemies that walk over it.

special.description: Burns ground enemies that walk over it.

pyro_flame_dancer.name: Flame Dancer
pyro_flame_dancer.description: A skilled flame dancer that slashes with a fiery blade.

special.description: Burns enemies.

pyro_pyromaniac.name: Pyromaniac
pyro_pyromaniac.description: A deranged pyromaniac that torches enemies with a flamethrower. Large splash radius. Can target air units.

special.description: Burns enemies.

pyro_searing_tower.name: Searing Tower
pyro_searing_tower.description: A searing tower that blasts enemies with fireballs. Large splash radius. Can target air units.

special.description: Burns ground enemies that walk over it.

pyro_incinerator.name: Incinerator
pyro_incinerator.description: A blazing incinerator vent from the burning molten core of the Pyro Empire. Radiates intense heat in a small area that also damages enemies unfortunate enough to be in the area.

tank_legion.description: Slow, heavy siege; excels at killing Fortified units

tank_defender.name: Tank Defender
tank_defender.description: A tank defender equipped with a rocket launcher that defends the tank command.

special.description: Deals more damage the further the target is upon impact.

tank_blasto_mortar.name: Blasto Mortar Tank
tank_blasto_mortar.description: Powerful artillery that can deals massive AOE damage.

special.description: Impact deals full damage in a small area.

tank_hercules_javelin_tank.name: Hercules Javelin Tank
tank_hercules_javelin_tank.description: A massive tank with a powerful javeling launcher that can deal massive damage to enemies.

tank_cauldron_juggernaut.name: Cauldron Juggernaut
tank_cauldron_juggernaut.description: A powerful tank that fires a massive corrosive shell to shred armor of even the toughest enemies.

zork.description: A rapidly multiplying swarm, large AOE, overwhelming foes with sheer numbers of cheap, expendable units.

zork_creep_colony.name: Creep Colony
zork_creep_colony.description: An eerie pitted terrain, breeding grounds for the Zork Swarm.

zork_horde_hurler.name: Horde Hurler
zork_horde_hurler.description: Launches a horde of Zorklings at the enemy that gnaws at them with sharp teeth.

gaia.description: Guardians of the forest, Gaia towers blend natural defenses with primal strength, featuring powerful siege and splash capabilities.

gaia_toadstool.name: Toadstool
gaia_toadstool.description: A sturdy, impassable toadstool that blocks enemy pathing.

gaia_treant_boulder_thrower.name: Treant Boulder Thrower
gaia_treant_boulder_thrower.description: A treant that throws boulders at the enemy, dealing damage to both ground and air units in a large area.

gaia_gnome.name: Gnome
gaia_gnome.description: Gaia's Gnomes are small but mighty. With luck on their side, they deal random damage, with a high critical multiplier.

gaia_ursa.name: Ursa
gaia_ursa.description: The ferocious ursine warriors defend the forest and their kin at all costs.

knights_keep.description: A disciplined order relying on sturdy defenses, sharp steel, and powerful siege engines.

special.description: Periodically attempts to instantly kill a nearby low-health enemy (below 15% HP).

bomb_brigade.description: Huge AOE, splash damage and big range, however they only deal siege damage.

bomb_mine_field.name: Mine Field
bomb_mine_field.description: A mine field that deals damage to ground units walking over it.

bomb_grenade_launcher.name: Grenade Launcher
bomb_grenade_launcher.description: A bouncing grenade dealing damage to both ground and air units in a large area.

bomb_bombardier.name: Bombardier
bomb_bombardier.description: A rocket launcher dealing high damage to both air and ground units.

bomb_barrage_beacon.name: Bombardment Barrage Beacon
bomb_barrage_beacon.description: Periodically calls down random artillery strikes within a large radius.

special.description: Periodically calls down random artillery strikes within a large radius.

stone_summoners.description: Their towers may critically strike, increasing their splash radius.

special.description: Critical hits have double the splash radius.
Critical hits have double the splash radius.
Critical hits have double the splash radius.

stone_tremor_totem.name: Tremor Totem
stone_tremor_totem.description: A totem that causes tremors to shake the ground, damaging units randomly in a small area.

special.description: Critical hits have double the splash radius.

stone_earth_spine.name: Earth Spine
stone_earth_spine.description: A towering spine of rock that destroys fortified units.

alchemists_guild.description: Experimenters wielding volatile concoctions and corrupted magic that melt armor, poison foes, and transmute reality.

igloo.description: Harnessing the biting cold, these structures slow and shatter foes with ice and frost.

special.description: Deals 25% bonus damage to Bonechilled enemies.
Deals 50% bonus damage to Bonechilled enemies.
Deals 30% bonus damage to Bonechilled enemies.
Deals 90% bonus damage to Bonechilled enemies.

alien.description: Wielders of cosmic energies, manipulating starlight, nebulas, and the void itself.

special.description: Deploys orbiting energy orbs that damage nearby enemies.

goblin_hovel.description: A ramshackle collection of crude contraptions and sneaky goblins. Wild min max.

goblin_snotlings.name: Snotlings
goblin_snotlings.description: Goblin slaves with crude clubs and axes. A bit of a mess, but they're cheap... and relentless.

special.description: Has a 15% chance on hit to permanently shred 1 armor from the target.
Has a 50% chance to misfire.

goblin_shredder.name: Goblin Shredder
goblin_shredder.description: Goblin savagery at its finest. A brutal cage contraption that rips enemies apart. Causes heavy hemmorhage damage over time.

brine.description: Crushing depths, arcane magic -- all towers have high splash and a chance to bash enemies.

special.description: Has a chance on hit to briefly stun the target.
Has a chance on hit to briefly stun the target.
Increases the splash radius of nearby towers by 75.
Has a chance on hit to briefly stun the target.
Has a chance on hit to briefly stun the target.
Continuously damages nearby enemies. Damage increases closer to the monument.

spark.description: Harnessing raw electrical energy to shock, stun, and overload enemies.

spark_arc_tower.name: Arc Tower
spark_arc_tower.description: Individually fires a weak projectile. Links with nearby Arc Towers to unleash a powerful chain zap from the furthest linked tower, dealing damage based on chain length.

special.description: Boosts the attack speed of immediately adjacent towers.

space_husks.description: Undead remnants animated by void energy, draining the lifeforce of their foes.

special.description: Each hit permanently reduces the target's maximum HP by 1%.
Each hit permanently reduces the target's maximum HP by 1%.
Gains +75 damage per consecutive hit (max 5 stacks). Stacks reset after 5 seconds without attacking.

tac.description: Titan Assembly Command fields specialized Titans for combating all threats.

special.description: Every 5th strike deals an additional 50 damage.

tac_jaguar_mech.name: Jaguar Mech
tac_jaguar_mech.description: A swift and deadly predator, striking with unmatched speed and precision.

special.description: Has a 20% chance to strike twice in quick succession.

tac_samurai_mech.name: Samurai Mech
tac_samurai_mech.description: A perfect blend of ancient discipline and modern power.

special.description: Has a 25% chance on hit to ignore 15 armor for this attack.

tac_athena_mech.name: Athena Mech
tac_athena_mech.description: Athena Mech targets the greatest threats, delivering a calculated blow to ensure victory

special.description: Prioritizes enemies with the highest current health.

tac_pummeler_mech.name: Pummeler Mech
tac_pummeler_mech.description: Devastating blows shake the ground, dealing immense splash to nearby enemies.

special.description: Each kill increases this towers permanent damage by 0.25 to a max of 150.
Snipers have a 10% chance to headshot enemies for 1000% damage.
Boosts the damage of immediately adjacent towers.

tech_center.description: Advanced scientists pushing the boundaries of range and firepower, culminating in the ultimate weapon.

tech_wall.name: Energy Wall
tech_wall.description: A wall comprised of pure science.

special.description: Walls block enemies from traversing the map.

tech_laser.name: Laser
tech_laser.description: A high tech laser beam that deals damage to its intended target.

tech_upgraded_laser.name: Upgraded Laser
tech_upgraded_laser.description: A more powerful laser that expands the capabilities of the laser.

tech_particle_accelerator.name: Particle Accelerator
tech_particle_accelerator.description: A particle accelerator that fires a high-speed particle beam, dealing damage to its intended target.

tech_ground_targeting_computer.name: Targeting Computer
tech_ground_targeting_computer.description: A targeting computer that allows towers to lock on to enemies.

special.description: Periodically marks the highest health enemy in range, causing it to take 50% more damage from all sources.

tech_freeze_ray.name: Freeze Ray
tech_freeze_ray.description: Manipulating the molecular structure of the air, this tower can slow enemies to a crawl.

tech_railgun.name: Railgun
tech_railgun.description: A supremely advanced superpowered railgun that deals high chaos damage.

tech_time_machine.name: Time Machine
tech_time_machine.description: A marvel of engineering, capable of rewinding time to a previous point.

seadogs.description: Featuring cannons and harpoons, may plunder extra gold from slain enemies.

seadog_wall.name: Ship Banner
seadog_wall.description: Enemies know where not to tread.

seadog_saltwater_soundrel.name: Saltwater Scoundrel
seadog_saltwater_soundrel.description: Small time cutthroats intent on stealing valuables.

special.description: Has a 15% chance to grant 1 gold on a killing blow.
Has a 15% chance to grant 1 gold on a killing blow.

seadog_chain_shot_cannon.name: Chain Shot Cannon
seadog_chain_shot_cannon.description: A cannon that fires small chain shot projectiles, slowing enemy movement.

seadog_slaver.name: Slaver
seadog_slaver.description: Ruthless slavers that use whips to attack enemies.

special.description: Whips up to 2 enemies in range, dealing 50% damage to the first targets and 100% damage to the last target hit.

seadog_broadside.name: Broadside
seadog_broadside.description: A large ship that fires 3 cannons from each side.

special.description: Fires 3 cannons from each side.

seadog_cannoneer.name: Cannoneer
seadog_cannoneer.description: Fires a massive cannonball, but takes a long time to reload.

seadog_harpoon_tower.name: Harpoon Tower
seadog_harpoon_tower.description: A tower that uses harpoons to pull enemies towards it.

heaven.description: Angelic defenders whose attacks always ignore a percentage ofenemy armor.

heaven_wrath_tower.name: Wrath Tower
heaven_wrath_tower.description: A holy spike that strikes with divine wrath.

special.description: Attacks ignore 1 enemy armor.

heaven_retribution_tower.name: Retribution Tower
heaven_retribution_tower.description: Invading forces will be met with a holy retribution.

special.description: Attacks ignore 3 enemy armor.

heaven_judgment_tower.name: Judgment Tower
heaven_judgment_tower.description: The darkness will be illuminated by the light of judgment.

special.description: Attacks ignore 4 enemy armor.

heaven_beacon_of_light.name: Beacon of Light
heaven_beacon_of_light.description: A beacon of pure heavenly light that exposes enemy armor.

special.description: Enemies within the aura have their armor reduced by 1.

heaven_archangel.name: Archangel
heaven_archangel.description: Archangels hold the line against the forces of darkness.

special.description: Attacks ignore 4 enemy armor.

heaven_seraphim.name: Seraphim
heaven_seraphim.description: Defilers are condemed to death by the seraphim.

special.description: Attacks ignore 5 enemy armor.

solar.description: Cosmic faction that melts foes with celestial energy.

solar_sun_spot.name: Sun Spot
solar_sun_spot.description: The Sun Spot emits waves ofsolar energy, causing nearby enemies to melt away.

special.description: Radiates intense heat, continuously burning nearby enemies.

solar_ray.name: Solar Ray
solar_ray.description: The Solar Ray beam emits pure solar energy.

special.description: Radiates intense heat, continuously burning nearby enemies.

solar_photon_relay.name: Photon Relay
solar_photon_relay.description: The Photon Relay absorbs nearby energy, amplifying nearby solar damage.

solar_helios.name: Helios
solar_helios.description: The Helios beam is a nightmare for anyone who enjoys the cold.

special.description: Radiates intense heat, continuously burning nearby enemies.

solar_corona.name: Corona
solar_corona.description: The Corona emits beams so hot it can melt nearly anything.

special.description: Radiates intense heat, continuously burning nearby enemies.

solar_star_forge.name: Star Forge
solar_star_forge.description: Harnessing the power of nearby solar emissions, one can wield the power of the sun itself.

special.description: Requires at least 3 immediately adjacent Solar towers to operate.

nomad_clans.description: A nomadic people with versatile skills, relying on resourcefulness and knowledge of the land rather than advanced technology.

nomad_wall.name: Sand Rock
nomad_wall.description: Large sandy rocks provide temporary cover for the nomads.

nomad_dune_dweller.name: Dune Raider
nomad_dune_dweller.description: With axe in hand, the raiders' grit is unyielding.

nomad_seer.name: Seer
nomad_seer.description: The seer is considered the wisest of the nomads.

nomad_bazaar.name: Bazaar
nomad_bazaar.description: The bazaar is a bustling market where the nomads trade goods and services.

special.description: Generates 5 gold per second.

nomad_spirit_ward.name: Spirit Ward
nomad_spirit_ward.description: This shamanistic effigy defends nomadic society against evil spirits.

nomad_caravan_guard.name: Caravan Guard
nomad_caravan_guard.description: A heavily armed and armored vetern of nomad society who protects the nomads' cargo.

nomad_bounty_hunter.name: Bounty Hunter
nomad_bounty_hunter.description: Hired guns don't come cheap, nor do they ask questions about what's in the caravans.

special.description: If this tower gets the killing blow, the player loses 1 gold.

nomad_boomeranger.name: Boomeranger
nomad_boomeranger.description: A skilled warrior wielding a mysterious deadly glaive

special.description: Throws a boomerang that travels out and returns along an offset path, damaging enemies.

nomad_caravan_depot.name: Caravan Depot
nomad_caravan_depot.description: Thieves are in for a deadly surprise.

special.description: Launches a fixed-distance caravan that damages enemies it passes through and explodes at its destination.

ogre_stronghold.description: Brutish ogres wielding massive clubs and fists. They hit hard but slowly, striking only adjacent foes.

ogre_kin.name: Ogrekin
ogre_kin.description: Even the smallest ogres can overpower tough adversaries.

ogre_mage.name: Ogre Mage
ogre_mage.description: Few ogres dabble in the arcane arts, often with surprising results.

ogre_brute.name: Ogre Brute
ogre_brute.description: Brutes often lead the charge, their massive clubs a formidable sight.

ogre_war_drums.name: War Drums
ogre_war_drums.description: The drums of war inspire the ogres to fight with greater ferocity.

special.description: Periodically pulses, granting nearby friendly towers +0.5 critical damage multiplier for 1 second.

ogre_stomping_grounds.name: Stomping Grounds
ogre_stomping_grounds.description: Ogres often gather to prove their strength... or obliterate captured slaves.

ogre_smasher.name: Ogre Smasher
ogre_smasher.description: Smashers strike with such ferocity that can rattle even the mighitest warrior.

ogre_chieftain.name: Ogre Chieftain
ogre_chieftain.description: Chieftains are the biggest and the strongest of the ogres.

special.description: 20% chance on attack to increase own damage by 15% for 4 seconds.

industry.description: Industrialists are a race of people who are skilled in the art of building and manufacturing. They are known for their ability to create powerful machines and structures.

industry_machinist.name: Machinist
industry_machinist.description: The backbone of Industry, high damage output for a starting tower.

industry_smog_generator.name: Factory
industry_smog_generator.description: Factory smog increases the vulnerability of Air units.

special.description: Nearby projectile towers deal 20% more damage to Air units.

industry_oil_rig.name: Oil Rig
industry_oil_rig.description: Oil rigs generate gold for the player.

special.description: Periodically generates between 1 and 10 gold.

industry_missile_battery.name: Missile Battery Platform
industry_missile_battery.description: A missile battery platform that fires a rapid salvo of 6 missiles, then reloads.

special.description: Fires a rapid salvo of 6 missiles, then reloads.

industry_gattling_gun.name: Gattling Gun
industry_gattling_gun.description: A gun that revs up to 5 levels, increasing damage and speed.

special.description: Impact creates a lingering fallout zone.
